examples.example: 今天的天气真是太好了，非常适合出去游玩。

translate.english: Today's weather is really so good, it is very suitable for going out to play.

examples.example: 得知自己通过了考试，他高兴地说：“太好了，我的努力没有白费！”

translate.english: Learning that he had passed the exam, he happily said, "Great, my efforts were not in vain!"

examples.example: 这次比赛我们队发挥得太好了，最终获得了冠军。

translate.english: Our team performed extremely well in this competition and finally won the championship.
